name: Spamality!
description:
An arcade shooter, where you have to spam to win! Made for Open Jam 2018.

Controls
  • W, A, S, D - Movement
  • Click - Shoot
Tools
  • Text editor: Atom
  • Framework: Love2D
  • Sprite editor: Aseprite
  • SFX generator: Bfxr
Extra links

GitHub: https://github.com/liquid600pgm/spamality
